name: SUNDUSK BAY
description:
A game of fishes and underwater adventure.

**In Development, published this prototype for submission!!

INSTRUCTIONS/Control

MOUSE CLICK : TO CLICK (on ICONS and BUTTONS)

A : MOVE LEFT 

D : MOVE RIGHT

S :  MOVE DOWN

W :  JUMP 

Note*

This game is still in the progress of development.

All assets are created by ROK1006.
